notifications.instantNotificationsDesc: Get notified when friends come online
notifications.persistentNotificationsDesc: Keep a persistent notification showing online friends
notifications.infoText: Instant notifications will show when friends come online. Persistent notifications will stay in the notification panel and update regularly.
notifications.appNotificationsDisabled: App notifications are disabled in system settings
notifications.settingsSavedMessage: Your notification settings have been saved successfully.
notifications.resetMessage: Are you sure you want to reset all notification settings to default?
notifications.statusOffline: Offline - No notifications will be sent
